ARABIC: فَمَنِ ٱبْتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْعَادُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: but if anyone desires any more than that, they have overstepped the limits;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those who seek more than this will be transgressors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: but any who seeks to go beyond that, it is indeed they who are the transgressors,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but whoever goes beyond this is a transgressor;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So those who desire more than this – it is they who are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But whosoever seeks beyond that, then it is those who are trespassers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But he who seeks to go beyond this, these it is that go beyond the limits--
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: (but whoso seeks after more than that, they are the transgressors),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But whoso seeketh more than that, those are they who are transgressors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but those who go beyond that limit are transgressors;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And whosoever seeketh beyond that, then it is those who are the trespassers
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: but whoever seeks beyond that—it is they who are the transgressors)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But those who trespass beyond this are transgressors;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But whosoever seeks beyond that, then it is those who are trespassers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But whosoever seeks beyond that, they are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But whoever seeks to go beyond that—these are the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But whoever seeks beyond that, then they are the transgressors -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:31] but whoever seeks beyond that, those are the infringers, who transgress [the bounds of] what is lawful [stepping] into what is unlawful;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But whoso seeketh more than that) whoever seeks more than what I have mentioned of wives and slaves, (those are they who are transgressors) from that which is lawful to that which is unlawful;
